org.fhnw.aigs.Minesweeper.commons

Class MinesweeperField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fhnw.aigs.Minesweeper.commons.MinesweeperField

  • public class MinesweeperField
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the logical unit of a field. It is not to be confused with MinesweeperPane. It contains all information on a fields: Whether it contains a mine, was flagged, how many surrounding mines there are, the position and whether it has been uncovered yet.
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Matthias St√∂ckli

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean containsMine
      Indicates whether or not the field contains a mine.
      private boolean hasFlag
      Indicates whether or not the field was flagged by the player.

      Indicates whether or not the field was uncovered.
      private int surroundingMinesCount
      The number of mines around the field.
      private int xPosition
      The x-position of the field.
      private int yPosition
      The y-position of the field.
